participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily enjoys expressing herself through various art forms and values her time with family.
participant_1.background: I pretended to be a superhero with my kids and they loved it. I love to paint pictures. I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life. I am proud of my first movie, even though it is not perfect. I watch YouTube videos.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Inquisitive and idealistic, Jake has a passion for learning and sharing knowledge, but feels unfulfilled in his current job.
participant_2.background: My family tries to convince me to dump my fiancé. I am a traveling encyclopedia salesman. I enjoy this type of activist work, as my job is not very personally fulfilling. My parents were scientists. I read a poem or two to get my creative juices flowing before starting my day.

content.text: How's your day going?
Hi there! It's going pretty well so far. Thanks for asking!
I'm glad to hear that. My day is going well so far too.
That's great! What are you up to today?
I'm just working on a painting I'm really excited about.
That sounds really cool! I love painting.
Thanks! I'm glad you do.
I'm a potter, so I get to paint a lot, but I like painting pictures too.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to try pottery.
It's a lot of fun! I'd be happy to show you how sometime.
That would be awesome! Thanks!
You're welcome!
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to read and watch YouTube videos.
Me too! What kind of YouTube videos do you like to watch?
I like watching videos about art and history.
Oh cool! I like watching videos about science and technology.
That's cool! I like science and technology too.
Well, it was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day!
You too!
